item.title:
RT by @CoderDojo: ICYMI

item.title: RT by @CoderDojo: What!? "This day 3 years ago" just came up on the ole phone and this photo with it! Where were we in 2018? A @CoderDojo at @TwitterDublin! Where are they now? All studying at university, including 3 #STEM courses!
item.dc:creator: @TeenTurn

description.p: What!? "This day 3 years ago" just came up on the ole phone and this photo with it! Where were we in 2018? A @CoderDojo at @TwitterDublin! Where are they now? All studying at university, including 3 #STEM courses!

item.title: RT by @CoderDojo: We had our first @astro_pi mission zero session today ü•∞ 10 Ninjas offline and another 10 were online. Thanks to all our mentors who helped in this session. @votanikosdojo #MyCodeClub @CoderDojo
item.dc:creator: @nadiaali3000

description.p: We had our first @astro_pi mission zero session today ü•∞ 10 Ninjas offline and another 10 were online. Thanks to all our mentors who helped in this session. @votanikosdojo #MyCodeClub @CoderDojo

item.title:

Day 12 of #12DaysOfCode
item.dc:creator: @CoderDojo

How you can create margins and use padding on a webpage in HTML/CSS!

item.title:
Use a "class" in HTML/CSS when you want to apply the same styling to multiple elements on one webpage or across several different webpages.
See how changing the "background-color" of the "highlight" class changes the webpages that are linked to the CSS.
Day 11 of #12DaysOfCode
item.dc:creator: @CoderDojo

description.p:
Use a "class" in HTML/CSS when you want to apply the same styling to multiple elements on one webpage or across several different webpages.
See how changing the "background-color" of the "highlight" class changes the webpages that are linked to the CSS.
Day 11 of #12DaysOfCode

item.title:
Wow! Our growth partner, @Accenture, has done some amazing work in Costa Rica partnering with the UNHCR, to enable children in refugee situations learn how to code through CoderDojo.
Well done to all involved!üëè #FridayFeature https://vimeo.com/516813790
item.dc:creator: @CoderDojo
